properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 8 at 6:40AM EST until February 9 at 2:42AM EST by NWS Raleigh NC
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North
Carolina...

Yadkin River At Yadkin College affecting Davidson and Davie
Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
the Yadkin River At Yadkin College.
* At  6:16 AM Saturday the stage was 27.9 feet.
* Flood stage is 18.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river has crested and will continue to fall to below
flood stage by this afternoon.
* Impact...At 29.0 feet, Several homes are flooded, with floodwaters
covering an extensive area of primarily farm and pasture lands.
* Impact...At 26.0 feet, Several homes along the river begin to flood.
* Impact...At 25.0 feet, Flooding closes Sowers Road near Linwood and
Hollywood Drive at Grub Ferry road. A campground on Hannah Ferry
Road is flooded. Flooding also threatens the pumping station at
Davidson, Incorporated.
* Impact...At 23.0 feet, The upper campsites at the Thousand Trails
Preserve off US64 begin to flood.
* Impact...At 21.0 feet, Lower level primitive campsites at the
Thousand Trails Preserve off US64 begin to flood.
properties.instruction:
Safety message. If you encounter deep water while driving, do not
attempt to drive through. Turn around, dont drown.
